pcRouteFinderobject

Details

The pcRouteFinder works exactly the same as the more general routeFinder except that it finds routes only through TravelConnectors whose destinations are known. **`pcRouteFinder`**` :   `[`Pathfinder`](../object/Pathfinder.html)
